pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot that moves forward through a long, sterile-looking hallway. The walls, floor, and ceiling are covered in small, off-white tiles with a greenish tint. The camera first moves through what appears to be murky water and up a set of stairs before entering a long corridor lined with glowing, oval-shaped lights, all leading to a dark doorway at the very end.
